node._create_table_statement: CREATE TABLE `scratch` ( `scratch_id` int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `scratch_text` longtext, `scratch_title` char(255) NOT NULL DEFAULT '', `scratch_private` int(2) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `scratch_user` int(11) NOT NULL DEFAULT '0', `scratch_collab` char(255) NOT NULL DEFAULT '', PRIMARY KEY (`scratch_id`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=latin1
node.title: scratch
